thread.section_title: myprojectorlamps Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of myprojectorlamps | www.myprojectorlamps.ca
thread.title: Derek Burchill

author: Derek Burchill
title: Derek Burchill
text:
I ordered a projector lamp , when I received it in record time , I discovered that I ordered the wrong one, I emailed them explaining what happened , and told them which one I should have ordered , they said send it back and they will substitute for the correct lamp. Within days of sending the
Lamp back to my surprise the replacement arrived ! No hassle!
I might add that when I called them the staff couldn't have been more helpfull.
Thank you for your service!
